channel.title: Microsoft 365 developer podcast on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft 365 developer podcast on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Microsoft Teams development "plus" with Tom Morgan
item.description: Jeremy Thake catches up with Tom Morgan about Microsoft Teams development “plus”.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Universal Actions and Adaptive Card Updates with Fabian Williams
item.description: Fabian Williams joins Jeremy and Paul to talk about Universal Actions and updates to Adaptive Cards.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Office Add-Ins with Juan Balmori
item.description: Juan Balmori returns to the podcast, speaking with Jeremy about developing add-ins for Office Online.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Property Pane Portal project with Christophe Humbert
item.description: Christophe Humbert joins Jeremy and Paul to talk about his Property Pane Portal project and the help he has received from the M365 Dev Community.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Microsoft Graph Data Connect with Nik Charlebois
item.description: Nik Charlebois returns to provide an update on Microsoft Graph Data Connect.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Onboarding Developers with Ahmed El Herazy and Wes Hackett
item.description: Wes Hackett and Ahmed El Herazy talk with Paul and share their story of onboarding a developer into a team and ensuring the process is positive for all involved.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Kiota, the OpenAPI SDK Generator with Vincent Biret
item.description: Vincent Biret sits down with Jeremy to talk about Kiota - the new SDK generator from Microsoft.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Microsoft News: November 2021
item.description: Jeremy and Paul recap the latest news from Microsoft Listen to the show here: (m365devpodcast.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Exchange Deprecations with Greg Taylor
item.description: Greg Taylor brings his wealth of experience in Exchange to the show, discussing the upcoming deprecations in the Exchange online service.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Exporting Content Using the Teams Export API with Yaron Hezroni
item.description: Yaron Hezroni joins Jeremy and Paul to share the Export APIs for Microsoft Teams content.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - yo Teams Generator Update with Wictor Wilén
item.description: Wictor Wilén returns to provide an update to the yo Teams generator project.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Building a Solution with Low-Code Tools with Carmen Ysewijn and Luise Freese
item.description: Carmen Ysewijn and Luise Freese talk with Paul about their open-source project ProvisionGenie, discussing its components and their experience with the tools used to create the magic.

item.title: M365 Dev Podcast - Bot Framework Composer Video series with Ayça Baş and Bob German
item.description: Ayca and Bob return to the show to talk about a new video series that discusses the Who’s Online bot created using Bot Framework Composer and Cognitive Services.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Latest Microsoft Graph SDKs with Maisa Rissi and Darrel Miller
item.description: Maisa Rissi and Darrel Miller join Jeremy and Paul to talk about the latest updates to the Microsoft Graph SDKs, including PowerShell, .

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Microsoft 365 App Certification with Orion O'Malley
item.description: Orion O’Malley joins Jeremy and Paul to talk about the Microsoft 365 App Certification program and it’s benefits for organizations and developers.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Dev Podcast - SPO Performance with Sean McDonough
item.description: Sean McDonough shares his tips and tricks for improving SPO performance.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - AI & Cognitive Services with Prashant G Bhoyar
item.description: Prashant G Bhoyer sits down with Paul to answer questions about the AI offerings in Azure and how they are used in M365 and how they can be used by developers.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Content Design for SharePoint Syntex with Tom Resing
item.description: Tom Resing joins Paul at SPFest in Chicago to talk about his work as a Content Designer on SharePoint Syntex.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Dev Podcast - SPFx, Azure Functions and PnP Re-Usable controls with Joel Rodrigues
item.description: Joel Rodrigues joins Paul to talk about his projects using SPFx and Azure Functions, as well as his role as a maintainer of the PnP Re-Usable controls repository.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Office Add-Ins with Cam Dwyer
item.description: Paul talks with Cam Dwyer about creating add-ins for Office, including DevOps and security principles.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Secretless Apps with Christos Matskas
item.description: Christos Mastkas returns to the show to talk with Jeremy and Paul about “secretless” applications and the latest on Azure.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Azure AD Entitlement Management and Governance with Elisabeth Olso
item.description: Elisabeth Olson joins the show to answer questions about Azure AD Entitlement management and other AAD governance topics.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Microsoft Teams Toolkit with Zhenya Savchenko and Tim Ng
item.description: Zhenya Savchenko and Tim Ng from the Developer Division at Microsoft join Jeremy and Paul to talk about the Microsoft Teams Toolkit.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Microsoft Search with Mikael Svenson
item.description: Mikael Svenson joins Paul to talk about Search in Microsoft 365.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Dev Podcast - Building an Application on the Microsoft 365 Platform with Elio Struyf
item.description: Elio Struyf joins Paul to talk about his experiences while building an application in the Microsoft 365 ecosystem, including the Microsoft for Startups program.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Code Like a Pro in C# with Jort Rodenburg
item.description: Paul talks with Jort Rodenburg about his new book Code Like a Pro in C#.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Microsoft Graph Connectors with Brian T. Jackett
item.description: Jeremy and Paul talk with Brian T. Jackett about the Graph Connectors API.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Viva Connections with John Nguyen and Luca Bandinelli
item.description: Paul talks with John Nguyen and Luca Bandinelli about the developer story for Viva Connections.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Podcast - Azure Event Hub and Rich Notifications with Ayca Bas
item.description: Ayca Bas @aycabas returns to talk with Jeremy and Paul about updates to change notifications in Microsoft Graph.
